Desc.entry: Educational charity offering term-by-term courses in practical philosophy designed to be of use in everyday life, economics with justice and courses in practical parenting. Courses are open to all and usually of 10 weeks duration. The School of Philosophy is a branch of the School of Economic Science. The Art in Action event is held in July.

Telephone.entry: General enquiries and enrolments, and answerphone

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tuesday morning & Wednesday evening (Philosophy courses), Mon & Wed at 7.15pm (parenting courses),Wed 7.15pm (Economies with Justice course)

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
